work.summary: Development and open-source maintenance of PowerShell, a cross-platform object-oriented shell and scripting language
highlights: Maintainer of PowerShell, the PowerShell extension for VSCode and PSScriptAnalyzer
Expertise in parsing/compilation, static analysis, the module system
Cross-platform low-level .NET Core and .NET Framework, node.js and TypeScript
Added the && and || operators to PowerShell
Author/presenter of blog posts, documentation, RFCs and conference talks
Implemented and maintained cross-platform build and release infrastructure in Azure Pipelines

work.summary: Implementation of experimental domain-specific language support
highlights: Implemented keyword-oriented domain-specific language support in PowerShell
.NET metadata parsing following ECMA 335 using an undocumented library to read assemblies without loading them

work.summary: Full stack web development, IoT device integration and cloud deployment for Allume Energy, a solar energy startup
highlights: Integration with undocumented REST APIs in embedded devices
